quest.name: Loot Justice Mode
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Lethenmaer is sick to the back teeth with thieving scoundrels.
objectives: Speak with the well-armed larcener and defend yourself if necessary.
Deliver a pilfered weapon to Lethenmaer.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: You must be the one Lyna mentioned. She said you're quite the fighter. I've a job for you, if you're interested.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: A group of ne'er-do-wells have been making a nuisance of themselves down in Dampsole. What's worse, they're armed with the same gear that we use.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: We can't be sure whether it was stolen from the Imperative or if they got it from one of our own, selling it from under our noses. Whatever the cause, we need to get to the bottom of this.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: I want you to locate the stolen weapons and bring one back to me as evidence. My men'll collect the rest later. And if those thieving bastards try anything, do whatever is necessary to defend yourself.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: I only need to see one of them for now, as I doubt you can carry a whole arsenal of weapons by yourself. Or can you?

dialogue.name: BANDIT03390
dialogue.text: SheHe's after the stash! Get herhim!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This seems to be the stockpile of weapons that Lethenmaer is looking for.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: So, what have you brought me?

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: The markings on the hilt indicate the unit it belonged to. In this case, the rightful owner was part of a patrol that was attacked by sin eaters some time ago. Though we were able to recover their bodies, their weapons had already been taken.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: Gear like this would fetch a high price, but the fact that the looters kept it for themselves worries me. Whatever they were planning, it seems you were able to put a stop to it.

dialogue.name: LETHENMAER
dialogue.text: Gods, as if we don't already have enough to contend with. Well, thanks to you, the rest of them will think twice before they try looting anything from us again.
